body:
Hi again, Sorry to bother on this again. For some reason the polygon is still not showing after the update. I added this line: ghenv.Component.Params.Output[13].Hidden = False
and it works. I see the changes you made in the code when i update the file, (Output[15] and [17]), so i know i'm synced with the latest. I closed and opened GH and Rhino, but still ... Weird ... -A.
